topic.title: sitePublish error - no peers
topic.body:
When I try to use zeronet.py sitePublish I get this error:

 No peers found, sitePublish command only works if you already have visitors serving your site

Could it be because the port is closed? Here's the full output:

- Starting ZeroNet...
- OpenSSL loaded, version: 01000106F
- Version: 0.6.3 r3542, Python 2.7.6 (default, Nov 23 2017, 15:49:48) 
[GCC 4.8.4], Gevent: 1.0
- Loading site...
- Sending siteReload
- Can't connect to local websocket client: Connection is already closed.
- Creating FileServer....
TorManager Connecting to Tor Controller 127.0.0.1:9051
ConnServer Checking port 18171 using portchecker.co...
ConnServer [BAD :(] Port closed: Port 18171 is closed.
ConnServer Trying to open port using UpnpPunch...
ConnServer UpnpPunch run error: UpnpError: Failed to communicate with igd using port 18171 on local machine after 3 tries. in FileServer.py line 117 > UpnpPunch.py line 346 > UpnpPunch.py line 337
- Gathering peers from tracker
Site:1JMFcY..VaJP Publishing content.json to 5/0 peers (connected: 0) diffs: [] (0.00k)...
- No peers found, sitePublish command only works if you already have visitors serving your site

1533757756_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: People who moralize are normally trying to use moralizing/shaming as a means of control.

> [citadell](#comment_14_1GE4QKLQM3L6r1NngDQEuEzwNBqHoBiXtL): Supremacist? I think you should be glad that your ancestors fought for you and your country otherwise you could live in Somalia instead if that is better for you...

Which country?

1533843646_1EFHNZxRQ3QB5rhSuKbqVHKo3JMTW.body:
> [nekololi](#comment_250_1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB): the publish function is used to inform your peers of changes to your site. if you don't have any peers, it can't inform them of changes. publish will not get you any new peers. [...]

Thanks. How do I open that port on Debian?

1533831712_1Q5U8WerBKjVkN2aLMWH1ckmJFu5e.body: Freenet is dead. Most of the content I find there is 20+ years old

1534020190_15ZZiGkShjcPCmk1geSBYyz1Q8SeX.body: Your post makes no sense. It is just word-salad. It is hard to figure out what you mean.
